text: thawada manshapeshi wala thadagathiya athiwana athara pudgalayage lingika awayawayanta rudhiraya gala eema wadiwe.

api idama balanna ee paren giya.sakkili demalunta gewal hadanna me paren yanna idadenne naha kiyala para dunnu kena bana waduna.niwasa sanwardhana adhikariye mahaththuru kathakalath wadak wune naha.ee idame gewal hadana eka prashnayak kiyala siyambaalapitiya pare kilomitarayakata pamana aathin elaarsi ekata ayath wenath idamak dennam kiwa.

ethekudu, petrograng balaketu senankaya nagarayen pitathata maru kara yawimata apa wiruddha wi; militari wiplawawadi kamituwa nirmanaya kota (okthobar 16); siyalu hamuda ansha ha aayathanawalata apage komisarwarun path kala pasu, emagin petrograng hamudawe ana dena niladhari madulla pamanak no wa, mulu aanduwa ma da hudekala kara damunu kalhi, okthobar 25 da nagitime prathipalaya, adu ganane thun kalak ma - wadimanath no we nam - thindu wi thibuni. 9 eelanga dinawaladi, nangitime jayagrahanayata erehiwa paksha nayakathwaya thulinma mathuwe yayi lenin biyawu tharjanaya, wiwrutha karallaka rupaya gaththeya.

muslim wara marga nithi nosalaka helmata noda bayisikal padinawa, parawal awahira karagena yagnya karanawa, anga wahana kalu loguwa prashanagathayi (eeka oostreliyawe thahanam kala), lawdspikar dagena aagama kima anth ayata hiriharayak, (ape pansal wala modayoth meka karana nisa wena kenekuta andilla dik karanne kohomada), muslim wara pawul palanaya karanne nathi nisa ee jana kodtashaya wadi wenawalu.
ee nisa mata rakiyawa labewi yayi wishwasa kala.
pasuwa ema widi­yowa maka dama thibini.
